scripts.setup: yarn --ignore-scripts --emoji --silent --immutable && cd server && yarn --silent --ignore-scripts --emoji && cd .. && cd client && yarn --silent --ignore-scripts --emoji
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn dev" "cd client && yarn dev"
scripts.clear: rimraf node_modules && cd server && rimraf node_modules && cd .. && cd client && rimraf node_modules build
